name: Seyyed Hossein Mousavi Manesh
title: Mobile Developer | Flutter & Dart Specialist
about_me: I am Seyyed Hossein Mousavi Manesh, a mobile developer with over two years of experience building professional applications using Flutter and Dart. I am skilled in state management with BLoC and integrating REST APIs. I have experience in UI design with Adobe XD and implementing team projects using Clean Architecture. I am committed to delivering clean and optimized code, with a portfolio of successful applications on GitHub. I am eager to learn new technologies and collaborate in dynamic environments to create innovative products.
footer: Â© 2025 Seyyed Hossein Mousavi Manesh. All rights reserved.
ghese_shab_project_desc: An audio story app built with Clean Architecture, BLoC state management, SharedPreferences caching, and Hive database.
cavallo_project_desc: A dedicated application for the city of Behbahan with various features for local users.
resume_content:
Professional Experience:
Flutter Developer (Freelance) | 2023 - Present
- Developed cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter for various clients, including an e-commerce app with over 1,000 active users.
- Implemented Clean Architecture and BLoC state management to enhance code scalability and maintainability.
- Collaborated with design teams to implement engaging user interfaces using Adobe XD.
- Integrated REST APIs using Dio for seamless connectivity to backend servers.

Graphic Designer (Freelance) | 2022 - 2023
- Designed user interfaces and logos using Photoshop and Adobe XD for various projects.
- Worked with developers to ensure designs aligned with technical requirements.

Education:
Bachelor of Computer Engineering - Software | Khatam al-Nabieen University, Behbahan | 2021 - Present
- GPA: 17.5/20 (through sixth semester)

Certifications:
- Mobile Application Development with Flutter | Online Academy | 2023
- Fundamentals of User Experience (UX) Design | Online Academy | 2022
